I founded the boutique consulting firms Equalis Strategy & Modeling and SiRM - Strategies in Regulated Markets. My mission is building bridges between economic science and policy making in health insurance & health care. I am straightforward and connect stakeholders based on content and shared interests. My passion is finding the right answers with observational data, computer code and human interaction.
